Key Match Events: Bradley Barcola scored in the 1st minute for France.
Federico Dimarco scored in the 30th minute for Italy.
Davide Frattesi scored in the 51st minute for Italy.
Giacomo Raspadori scored in the 74th minute for Italy.
Italy staged a remarkable comeback to defeat France 3-1 in their UEFA Nations League A Group 2 opener.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Parc des Princes in Paris, France, with an attendance of 44,956 spectators.
